dict.acceptation: 拖拽；吃力地往前拉；拖地而行；
沿地面拖动；落后；缓慢前进；打捞；

sent.orig: Drag and haul suggest that the object is heavy and usually pulled along the ground.
sent.trans: drag和haul指所拉者为重物，通常为在地面上移动。

sent.orig: Drag onto the page. Drag the yellow diamond to resize keyway.
sent.trans: 拖到绘图页上。拖动黄色菱形可调整键沟的大小。

sent.orig: There are two kinds of drags, parasite drag and induced drag.
sent.trans: 阻力有两种：寄生阻力和诱导阻力。

sent.orig: Drag onto the page, then drag yellow diamonds to adjust arrowhead or tail.
sent.trans: 拖到绘图页上，然后拖动黄色菱形可以调整箭头或箭尾。

sent.orig: Drag onto the page, then drag the yellow diamond to resize the box and arrow.
sent.trans: 拖到绘图页上，然后拖动黄色菱形，可调整框和箭头的大小。
